title: Tend
description: Direct deposit puts your money in your wallet, faster.

hero.headline: PAY DAY JUST GOT BETTER.
hero.sub-copy: Sign up for direct deposit and you’ll get A) your money faster and B) a Tend Share - which rewards you with monthly cash bonuses for as long as...well...how long have you got?

faster-access.headline: Faster access to your cash.
faster-access.body: When you turn on direct deposit, you’ll get your paycheck faster than with a check. All the better for paying the bills or splurging on date night with your #1. No more waiting in line at the bank, no more paper checks.

value-props.label: Paychecks with benefits.
value-props.body: We’ll cover a month of your Tend membership fee when you turn on direct deposit. And you’ll earn a Tend Share - which earns you a cash bonus every month, forever.

value-props.label: Your paycheck, on autopilot.
value-props.body: Set up direct deposit right from your Tend app in less time than it takes to find a movie on Netflix.
